```{r}
n = 60
age.range = '8-12'

"groups 20 SAD, 20 GAD, 20 GAD"

"SAD = social anxiety; GAD = general axiety; NAD = un cazzo"

infos = c("mean", "sd")

SAD_MCQC_NBW = c(12.45, 3.28)

NAD_MCQC_PBW = c(7.60, 1.54)
GAD_MCQC_PBW = c(9.00, 3.77)
SAD_MCQC_PBW = c(8.25, 3.18)

# Post Hoc
post_hoc = c("difference", "sd", "significance", "lowerCI", "upperCI")
NAD_GAD = c(-3.25, 1.02, 0.007, -5.71, -0.79)

```



```{r}
A1 = rbind(NAD_MCQC_NBW, NAD_MCQC_PBW)
A1 = as.data.frame(A1)
colnames(A1) = c('mean', 'sd')
A1$group_size = c(20, 20)


A2 = rbind(SAD_MCQC_NBW, SAD_MCQC_PBW)
A2 = as.data.frame(A2)
colnames(A2) = c('mean', 'sd')
A2$group_size = c(20, 20)
```


```{r}
print(A1)
print(A2)
```


```{r}
a = escalc(measure = 'SMD', m1i = A1$mean, m2i = A2$mean,
       sd1i = A1$sd, sd2i = A2$sd,
       n1i = A1$group_size, n2i = A2$group_size )
a
```
